# SaThuCoin (สาธุคอยน์)

> Every token represents a verified act of generosity.

SaThuCoin (SATHU) is a recognition token on the Base blockchain (Ethereum L2 by Coinbase). It is minted and given to charitable donors when their donation is verified by a participating institution. Each token serves as permanent, verifiable proof of generosity recorded on-chain.

## Key Facts

- **Token Name**: SaThuCoin (SATHU / สาธุคอยน์)
- **Chain**: Base Mainnet (Chain ID: 8453)
- **Contract Address**: 0x974FCaC6add872B946917eD932581CA9f7188AbD
- **Type**: ERC-20 recognition token
- **Cost to donors**: Free — no fees or charges
- **Purpose**: Permanent on-chain proof of charitable donations

## How It Works

1. A donor makes a contribution to a participating institution (temple, charity, foundation)
2. The institution verifies the donation and submits it to the SaThuCoin smart contract
3. SATHU tokens are minted and sent directly to the donor's wallet
4. The deed is permanently recorded on the Base blockchain

## Pages

- [Home](https://sathucoin.happycareth.com/) — Overview, live token stats, supply progress
- [For Donors](https://sathucoin.happycareth.com/donors) — Balance checker, deed history, wallet setup guide, FAQ
- [For Institutions](https://sathucoin.happycareth.com/institutions) — How to participate, integration info, FAQ
- [Token Stats](https://sathucoin.happycareth.com/stats) — Live on-chain data, supply charts, recent deeds
- [About](https://sathucoin.happycareth.com/about) — Mission, how it works, resources
